short_description: A Quality Assurance Solution To help you manage, quality-assure, inspect, investigate and risk-rate customers, as well as moderating and sampling their assessment activities, and so much more.
long_description: A Quality Assurance Solution To help you manage, quality-assure, inspect, investigate and risk-rate customers, as well as moderating and sampling their assessment activities, and so much more. A CONSULTANCY SERVICE Alongside our creatiogreen solution, we also offer specialist consultancy services to AOs and EPAOs.
